title: Can I use my phone as a mobile Wi-Fi hotspot and access the Internet from another device using my phone's data connection?
answer:
Yes. To activate this, turn on the Wi-Fi hotspot on your phone as follows: 

 Choose Settings > Wireless & networks > More > Tethering & portable hotspot > Portable Wi-Fi hotspot. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111415)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111416)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111417)

 Clicking set up Wi-Fi hotpot，you can set the name(SSID),passwordand security. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111418)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111419)

 The test phone open the WLAN hotpot,The auxiliary phone open WLAN to search the test phone’ SSID and connect this WLAN hotpot,it can surf the Internet.
